list.title: IdPayDriver
list.description: Class that provides methods to interact with the IdPay API.

list.title: IdPayDriver#request
list.description: Request method to create a transaction.

list.title: IdPayDriver#request
list.description: Request method to create a transaction.

list.title: IdPayDriver#setSandBox
list.description: Set whether to use the sandbox environment or not.

list.title: IdPayDriver#setSandBox
list.description: Set whether to use the sandbox environment or not.

list.title: IdPayDriver#setToken
list.description: Set the API token for authentication.

list.title: IdPayDriver#setToken
list.description: Set the API token for authentication.

list.title: IdPayDriver#verify
list.description: Verify method to verify a transaction.

list.title: IdPayDriver#verify
list.description: Verify method to verify a transaction.

list.title: IdPayUrls
list.description: Enum representing URLs for interacting with the IdPay API.

list.title: IdPayUrls.IdPayUrls["REQUEST"]
list.description: URL for creating a payment request.

list.title: IdPayUrls.IdPayUrls["VERIFY"]
list.description: URL for verifying a payment.

list.title: PaymentResponseIdPay
list.description: Represents the payment details in the response for IdPay.

list.title: PaymentResponseIdPay#amount
list.description: Amount associated with the payment.

list.title: PaymentResponseIdPay#card_no
list.description: Card number used for the payment.

list.title: PaymentResponseIdPay#date
list.description: Date of the payment.

list.title: PaymentResponseIdPay#hashed_card_no
list.description: Hashed card number for security reasons.

list.title: PaymentResponseIdPay#track_id
list.description: Tracking ID for the payment.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputIdPay
list.description: Represents the input structure for creating a transaction with IdPay.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputIdPay#amount
list.description: Desired amount in Rials.Amount must be between 1,000 Rials to 500,000,000 Rials.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputIdPay#callback
list.description: Merchant's callback URL.Maximum length: 2048 characters.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputIdPay#desc
list.description: Transaction description.Maximum length: 255 characters.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputIdPay#mail
list.description: Email address of the payer.Maximum length: 255 characters.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputIdPay#name
list.description: Name of the payer.Maximum length: 255 characters.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputIdPay#order_id
list.description: Merchant order ID.Maximum length: 50 characters.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputIdPay#phone
list.description: Mobile number of the payer.Length should be 11 characters.Examples: 9382198592, 09382198592, 989382198592.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputIdPay#token
list.description: The token for authentication, if available.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputZp
list.description: Represents the input structure for creating a transaction with ZarinPal.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputZp#amount
list.description: Amount for the transaction.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputZp#callback_url
list.description: Callback URL to redirect after the transaction.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputZp#currency
list.description: Currency type for the transaction, either "IRR" or "IRT".

list.title: TransactionCreateInputZp#description
list.description: Description for the transaction.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputZp#merchant_id
list.description: Merchant ID, if available.

list.title: TransactionCreateInputZp#metadata
list.description: Additional metadata for the transaction.

list.title: TransactionCreateResponseIdPay
list.description: Represents the response structure for creating a transaction with IdPay.

list.title: TransactionCreateResponseIdPay#data
list.description: Data related to the transaction if successful.

list.title: TransactionCreateResponseIdPay#error_code
list.description: Error code if an error occurred, otherwise null.

list.title: TransactionCreateResponseIdPay#error_message
list.description: Error message if an error occurred, otherwise null.

list.title: TransactionCreateResponseIdPay#isError
list.description: Indicates if there's an error in the response.

list.title: TransactionCreateResponseZp
list.description: Represents the response structure for creating a transaction with ZarinPal.

list.title: TransactionCreateResponseZp#data
list.description: Data related to the transaction if successful.

list.title: TransactionCreateResponseZp#error
list.description: Error details if an error occurred.

list.title: TransactionCreateResponseZp#isError
list.description: Indicates if there's an error in the response.

list.title: TransactionErrorZp
list.description: Represents the error structure for ZarinPal transactions.

list.title: TransactionErrorZp#code
list.description: Error code.

list.title: TransactionErrorZp#message
list.description: Error message.

list.title: TransactionErrorZp#validations
list.description: Validation errors related to the transaction input.

list.title: TransactionVerifyInputIdPay
list.description: Represents the input structure for verifying a transaction with IdPay.Inherits properties 'order_id' and 'token' from TransactionCreateInputIdPay.

list.title: TransactionVerifyInputIdPay#id
list.description: Transaction ID.

list.title: TransactionVerifyInputZp
list.description: Represents the input structure for verifying a transaction with ZarinPal.Inherits properties 'merchant_id' and 'amount' from TransactionCreateInputZp.

list.title: TransactionVerifyInputZp#authority
list.description: Transaction authority.

list.title: TransactionVerifyResponseIdPay
list.description: Represents the response structure for verifying a transaction with IdPay.Inherits properties from TransactionCreateResponseIdPay and modifies the 'data' property.

list.title: TransactionVerifyResponseIdPay#data
list.description: Detailed data related to the verified transaction.

list.title: TransactionVerifyResponseZp
list.description: Represents the response structure for verifying a transaction with ZarinPal.

list.title: TransactionVerifyResponseZp#data
list.description: Data related to the verified transaction if successful.

list.title: TransactionVerifyResponseZp#error
list.description: Error details if an error occurred.

list.title: TransactionVerifyResponseZp#isError
list.description: Indicates if there's an error in the response.

list.title: ZarinPalDriver
list.description: Class to interact with the ZarinPal payment gateway.

list.title: ZarinPalDriver#request
list.description: Create a payment request to ZarinPal.

list.title: ZarinPalDriver#request
list.description: Create a payment request to ZarinPal.

list.title: ZarinPalDriver#setToken
list.description: Set the merchant ID for the ZarinPal driver.

list.title: ZarinPalDriver#setToken
list.description: Set the merchant ID for the ZarinPal driver.

list.title: ZarinPalDriver#verify
list.description: Verify a payment transaction with ZarinPal.

list.title: ZarinPalDriver#verify
list.description: Verify a payment transaction with ZarinPal.

list.title: ZarinpalUrls
list.description: Enum representing URLs for interacting with the ZarinPal API endpoints.

list.title: ZarinpalUrls.ZarinpalUrls["REQUEST"]
list.description: URL for creating a payment request in the production environment.

list.title: ZarinpalUrls.ZarinpalUrls["REQUEST_PAGE"]
list.description: URL for the payment page in the production environment.

list.title: ZarinpalUrls.ZarinpalUrls["SANDBOX_REQUEST"]
list.description: URL for creating a payment request in the sandbox environment.

list.title: ZarinpalUrls.ZarinpalUrls["SANDBOX_REQUEST_PAGE"]
list.description: URL for the payment page in the sandbox environment.

list.title: ZarinpalUrls.ZarinpalUrls["SANDBOX_VERIFY"]
list.description: URL for verifying a payment in the sandbox environment.

list.title: ZarinpalUrls.ZarinpalUrls["VERIFY"]
list.description: URL for verifying a payment in the production environment.

list.title: zarinPalErrors
list.description: Object containing error codes and their corresponding descriptions for ZarinPal payment gateway.This list is based on the official documentation provided by ZarinPal.
